snippet: Defender Luis Hernandez has joined Leicester City on a free transfer from La Liga side Sporting Gijon on a four-year contract, the Premier League champions said on Tuesday....

headline.main: Defender Hernandez Signs for Leicester on a Four-Year Deal
headline.print_headline: Defender Hernandez Signs for Leicester on a Four-Year Deal

lead_paragraph: Defender Luis Hernandez has joined Leicester City on a free transfer from La Liga side Sporting Gijon on a four-year contract, the Premier League champions said on Tuesday.

snippet: The takeover of English Premier League club West Bromwich Albion by Chinese investors has been finalized....

headline.main: Chinese Investors Complete Takeover of West Brom
headline.print_headline: Chinese Investors Complete Takeover of West Brom

lead_paragraph: The takeover of English Premier League club West Bromwich Albion by Chinese investors has been finalized.

snippet: Former England international Joe Cole has made his loan move to Coventry City permanent after signing on a free transfer from Premier League strugglers Aston Villa, the League One (third-tier) side said....

headline.main: Former England Midfielder Cole Extends Coventry Stay
headline.print_headline: Former England Midfielder Cole Extends Coventry Stay

lead_paragraph: Former England international Joe Cole has made his loan move to Coventry City permanent after signing on a free transfer from Premier League strugglers Aston Villa, the League One (third-tier) side said.

snippet: Manchester United proved they still have the ability to grind out results with their hard-fought 2-1 win over Crystal Palace on Wednesday, midfielder Ander Herrera said....

headline.main: Man United Showed Spirit in Palace Late Show, Says Herrera
headline.print_headline: Man United Showed Spirit in Palace Late Show, Says Herrera

lead_paragraph: Manchester United proved they still have the ability to grind out results with their hard-fought 2-1 win over Crystal Palace on Wednesday, midfielder Ander Herrera said.

snippet: Sunderland forward Fabio Borini has been ruled out for around three months with a groin injury, British media reported on Thursday....

headline.main: Sunderland's Borini Out for Three Months With Groin Injury-Reports
headline.print_headline: Sunderland's Borini Out for Three Months With Groin Injury-Reports

lead_paragraph: Sunderland forward Fabio Borini has been ruled out for around three months with a groin injury, British media reported on Thursday.

snippet: West Bromwich Albion goalkeeper Boaz Myhill has extended his contract until 2018, the Premier League club said....

headline.main: West Brom Goalkeeper Myhill Extends Contract to 2018
headline.print_headline: West Brom Goalkeeper Myhill Extends Contract to 2018

lead_paragraph: West Bromwich Albion goalkeeper Boaz Myhill has extended his contract until 2018, the Premier League club said.

snippet: Newcastle United striker Ayoze Perez has signed a five-and-a-half contract through to 2021, the Premier League club said on Monday....

headline.main: Perez Signs New Five-And-a-Half Year Newcastle Contract
headline.print_headline: Perez Signs New Five-And-a-Half Year Newcastle Contract

lead_paragraph: Newcastle United striker Ayoze Perez has signed a five-and-a-half contract through to 2021, the Premier League club said on Monday.

snippet: Chelsea striker Diego Costa's class shone through as he fired them back to the top of the Premier League on Sunday with a 1-0 win over West Bromwich Albion as the previous day's goal glut turned into a trickle....

headline.main: Costa Fires Chelsea Back to the Top, United Beat Spurs
headline.print_headline: Costa Fires Chelsea Back to the Top, United Beat Spurs

lead_paragraph: Chelsea striker Diego Costa's class shone through as he fired them back to the top of the Premier League on Sunday with a 1-0 win over West Bromwich Albion as the previous day's goal glut turned into a trickle.

snippet: West Ham United will be without Diafra Sakho for Wednesday's League Cup quarter-final at Manchester United after he injured his hamstring in the Premier League draw between the sides at Old Trafford on Sunday....

headline.main: West Ham Fear Sakho Faces Another Lengthy Layoff
headline.print_headline: West Ham Fear Sakho Faces Another Lengthy Layoff

lead_paragraph: West Ham United will be without Diafra Sakho for Wednesday's League Cup quarter-final at Manchester United after he injured his hamstring in the Premier League draw between the sides at Old Trafford on Sunday.

snippet: Premier League club Hull City have declined to comment on the status of a 130 million pound takeover proposal from a group listed on the Hong Kong Stock Exchange....

headline.main: Hull Remain Quiet on Report of 130 Million Pound Takeover
headline.print_headline: Hull Remain Quiet on Report of 130 Million Pound Takeover

lead_paragraph: Premier League club Hull City have declined to comment on the status of a 130 million pound takeover proposal from a group listed on the Hong Kong Stock Exchange.
